summary: An insane preacher (Snoop Dogg) seeks retribution from the local crime syndicate (Big Pun & Fat Joe) for the death of his family and the burning of his church.
cast: Snoop Dogg|Big Pun|Ice-T|Fat Joe|T.J. Storm|Vincent Klyn|Romany Malco|Tahitia Hicks|Eva La Dare|Ernie Hudson Jr.|Jahi J.J. Zuri|Rob Ladesich|Michael Walde-Berger|Michaela Polakovicova|Ed Satterwhite|Jason Stapleton|Lubo Salater|Robert Ughoro
title: Urban Menace
